alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 3:40PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms with heavy rain will impact portions of Hampshire, Franklin and western Hampden Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 337 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms with heavy rain over Montgomery, or near Westfield, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain, pea size hail and 40 mph wind gusts with these storms. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rain may result in brief nuisance street flooding especially in the typical urban locations. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Chicopee, Westfield, Holyoke, Amherst, Northampton, Agawam, West Springfield, Greenfield, Deerfield, South Hadley, Easthampton, Monroe, Southwick, Montague, Granby, Southampton, Hadley, Sunderland and Hatfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire
